messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have detonated Gregory Wright's explosive implant in Perma on your station. Have a secure day.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are not dumbasses and blew up ALL OF PERMA just him.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Primary Tool Storage.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Shitcurity Command has renamed the station to "Dont look at us Station".

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Engineer's Office.
